fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom
Class StorageSCU

Object
  StorageSCU
public class StorageSCU
extends Object

Implements a storage SCU to be associated to a peer SCP for sending images through the network.

StorageSCU instances may be used as an output of DicomWriter.

The association is established during actual store, when the DicomWriter is asked to write an image. One association is established per dicom object to store.
